description.value: VKP norway uses the CarePlan to describe. - tjenesteoversikt - tiltaksplan - besøksplan

definition.value:
Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.
In VKP application this resource is used for transmitting what is called "tjeneste", "tiltaksplan" and "arbeidsplan". The category is given by the category code and are required to be given according to vkp-careplan-category.
The actual description of the careplan is given as text information in CarePlan.activity.detail.description

VKP project uses UUID.
Example: ~~~ "identifier": [ { "system":"urn:ietf:rfc:3986", "value":"urn:uuid:a76d9bbf-f293-4fb7-ad4c-2851cac77162" } ] ~~~
This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

description.value: VKP-Norway uses vkp-careplan-category to identify the different kinds of care plans.

definition.value:
Indicates when the plan did (or is intended to) come into effect and end.
Example: ~~~ "period":{ "start":"2018-04-24T10:00:00.936+02:00" } ~~~

short.value: The official name of the HERid namespace

definition.value:
The official name of the HERid namespace, identified by its oid value
Establishes the namespace for the value - that is, a URL that describes a set values that are unique.
The HERid value identifing the author of the CarePlan (could be a HealthcareService) The portion of the identifier typically relevant to the user and which is unique within the context of the system.

VKP-Norway uses activity.detail element to describe the contents of a CarePlan (aktivitetsplan, tjeneste or tiltaksplan).
Identifies a planned action to occur as part of the plan. For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring, education, etc.
The header of an activity.detail, usually one of the following: "Problem/Ressurs", "Mål", "Tiltak" or "Evaluering"
